rule_text: Use the standard knight movement rules from chess.
The knight glides like a bishop across any number of diagonal squares.
Use the standard rook movement rules from chess.
The rook behaves like a knight, leaping in the usual L-shape.
Use the standard knight movement rules from chess.
The knight glides like a bishop across any number of diagonal squares.
Use the standard rook movement rules from chess.
The rook behaves like a knight, leaping in the usual L-shape.
Use the standard knight movement rules from chess.
The knight glides like a bishop across any number of diagonal squares.
Use the standard bishop movement rules from chess.
The bishop now moves like a king, one square in any direction.
Use the standard bishop movement rules from chess.
The bishop is constrained to straight files and ranks like a rook.
Use the standard rook movement rules from chess.
The rook may only move exactly two squares diagonally in any direction.
Use the standard rook movement rules from chess.
The rook may only move exactly two squares diagonally in any direction.
Use the standard rook movement rules from chess.
The rook may only move exactly two squares diagonally in any direction.
Use the standard knight movement rules from chess.
The knight becomes a rook that can only move horizontally or vertically.
Use the standard rook movement rules from chess.
The rook may only move exactly two squares diagonally in any direction.
